Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. We try to stay well within the safety zone of the way we're operating with respect to the legal issues and the competitive issues. We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects. still owes billions to the U.S. and Canadian governments, and the U.S. retains a 9 percent stake in the company, but Sergio Marchionne has talked of paying the governments back by the end of the year. I'd like to pay them off in 2011, if I could, Sergio Marchionne told reporters earlier this month.`` I would like to get it done as quickly as I could.'' ABC News, which has released a preview of Donald Rumsfeld 's interview with Diane Sawyer , the former defense secretary claimed that the interrogation of 9/11 plotter Mohammad al-Qahtani provided valuable information that saved American lives. Qahtani, who was the 20th hijacker, they say-- he gave a lot of information, Donald Rumsfeld said.`` And it was very helpful to our interrogators and to the United States government in saving lives.''
